titles.title: Henshin Gattai! 5 tsu no Atsuki Tamashii
変身合体!!5つの熱き魂

anime.description: Animator Sakamoto Shouta (坂本渉太) conceived, designed, animated, and also composed music for the above animated short, which the anime studio http://anidb.net/cr718 [Gainax] began featuring on its official website. The video mimics the popular sentai genre, with five young people transforming into a costumed superhero team. Note: The video is the first one of a planned "MUSIC is SF" series.
